articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Guests
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, respectively met and had conversations with foreign guests who paid courtesy calls on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Sunday.
					 They included the delegation of the Communist Party of Cuba, delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam, delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico, delegation of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola, delegation of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and Democracy of Democratic Congo, delegation of the United Left Movement of Dominica, Ugandan delegation, Lao party and government delegation, president of the World Federation of Democratic Youth and the president of the Inoki Genom Joint Co., Ltd. of Japan and his party.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Peruvian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Peruvian President
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Ollanta Moises Humala Tasso, president of Peru, on the occasion of the 192nd anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the Peruvian people progress and prosperity, expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger on a new stage.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Meets Vietnamese Military Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Meets Vietnamese Military Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, on Sunday met and had a talk with the Vietnamese military delegation headed by Luong Cong, deputy head of the General Political Department of the Vietnam People's Army.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Foreign Guests 
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, respectively met and had conversations with the Indonesian government delegation led by Meutia Farida Hatta Swasono, advisor of the Presidential Advisory Council, and the delegation of the Iranian Majlis Friendship Group led by Musalreza Servati, chairman of the Planning and Budget Subcommittee of the Public Affairs Committee of Majlis, that paid courtesy calls on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Sunday.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Indian Govt. Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Indian Govt. Delegation
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the Indian government delegation led by Sitaram Yechury, chairman of the Standing Committee of the Transport, Tourism and Culture of the Parliament who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Sunday.

articles.title: WPK Secretaries Meet Foreign Party Delegations, Delegates
articles.content:
WPK Secretaries Meet Foreign Party Delegations, Delegates
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and Kim Yong Il, secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had talks with the visiting party delegations and delegates of different countries on Sunday.
					 Kim Ki Nam met the delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, secretary of the Sverdlovsk Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, delegation of deputies of the State Duma from A Just Russia, a delegate of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, delegation of the Communist Party of Belarus, a member of the Central Committee of the Ukrainian Communist Party who is the second secretary of the Crimean Republic Committee, a member of the Political Executive Committee of the Central Committee of the Party of Communists of the Moldovan Republic and the Lao party and government delegation.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok met the delegation of the Socialist Workers' Party of United States of America, delegation of the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist), a delegate of the Brazilian Communist Party and a delegate of the Sandinist National Liberation Front of Nicaragua.
					
					 Kim Yong Il met a member of the National Policy Forum of the British Labor Party and his party, the president of Inoki Genom Joint Co., Ltd. of Japan and his party and the delegation of the Fukuoka Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association.

articles.title: DPRK Vice-Premier Meets Foreign Guests
articles.content:
DPRK Vice-Premier Meets Foreign Guests
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Vice-Premier Kang Sok Ju met and had conversations with the delegation of the Namibian government delegation, special envoy of the Myanmar president, delegate of the Palestinian president and the delegate of the Algerian government who paid courtesy calls on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Sunday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Namibian President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Namibian President
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from Namibian President Hifikepunye Pohamba on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The gift was handed over to Vice-Premier Kang Sok Ju on Sunday by Nambahu Thomas Tommy, vice-minister of Justice who is heading the Namibian government delegation, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The gift was handed over to Vice Premier Kang Sok Ju on Sunday by Jamal A. H. Al Muhisin, representative of the president of the State of Palestine, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Guests
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received gifts from foreign guests on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They included the delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, delegation of deputies of the State Duma from A Just Russia, delegation of the Communist Party of Belarus, the delegation of the Center for Energy and Security Studies of Russia, secretary of the Sverdlovsk Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, member of the Central Committee of the Ukrainian Communist Party who is second secretary of the Crimean Republic Committee, delegate of the Nepali government and the heads of delegation of the Communist Party of Cuba, delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam, Lao party and government delegation and the delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico.
					
					 Kim Jong Un also received gifts from the C.C., the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola, United Left Movement of Dominica, the C.C., the Brazilian Communist Party, Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong, China, speaker of the Iranian Majlis, national secretary of the Socialist Workers' Party of the United States of America, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist), chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia and the chairman of the Party of Communists of the Moldovan Republic.
					
					 Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a gift from Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The gift was handed over to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Sunday by Vice-President Edward Kiwanuka Sekandi who is heading the Ugandan delegation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Flies Back
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Flies Back
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the People's Republic of China headed by Li Yuanchao, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and vice-president of China, left here on Sunday after paying an official goodwill visit to the DPRK. The delegation took part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War at the invitation of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					 It was seen off at the airport by Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, Lieutenant General of the Korean People's Army Ryom Chol Song, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, officials concerned, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the People's Republic of China headed by Li Yuanchao, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and vice-president of China, visited the Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory on Sunday.
					 After being briefed on the development the factory has made under the warm care of the peerlessly great men at the room dedicated to the history of the factory, the guests looked round various places including production and packaging processes which were put on a high automatic and robotization basis, and the modern center for disseminating science and technology.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Foreign Delegations Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Syrian delegation, the Indonesian government delegation, the delegation of the Ministry of Justice of Mongolia and the Vietnamese delegation of the General Police Bureau visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Sunday.
					  They went round historic relics with keen interest, being briefed on the story about the historic old home of Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae.
					
					 The head of the Indonesian government delegation said that Kim Il Sung was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family.
					
					 The members of his family devoted their all to the country and the people, he added.
					
					  The head of the Syrian delegation said that Kim Il Sung liberated Korea and built a socialist state on this land.
					
					 The head of the delegation of the Ministry of Justice of Mongolia said that Kim Il Sung was a great leader who rendered great services for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 The delegations of Syria, Zambia and Uganda and the Indian government delegation visited the Rungna Dolphinarium.
					
					 The Ugandan high-ranking military delegation, the Iranian military delegation and the Mozambican military delegation toured the Korean People's Army Museum of Weapons and Equipment.

articles.title: Army-People Meeting with War Veterans Held
articles.content:
Army-People Meeting with War Veterans Held
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- An army-people meeting with war veterans took place before a mosaic depicting ever-victorious and iron-willed commander Kim Il Sung at the Jonsung Revolutionary Site on Sunday as part of celebrations of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials of armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and other people of institutions and enterprises and youth and students in Pyongyang together with war veteran delegates.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, in his congratulatory speech said the victory in the war was a shining victory of the might of ideology and strategy and tactics of the President, and a proud victory brought about by the strong mental power of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 All the men and officers of the KPA and the people should devotedly defend the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in any adversity and uphold with loyalty the Songun leadership of the party and emerge honorable victors in the confrontation with the U.S. and in the building of a thriving socialist nation, he urged.
					
					 Kim Ki U, lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, speaking on behalf of the war veterans, called on the new generation to uphold the dear respected Kim Jong Un's Songun revolutionary leadership with loyalty and fight in the same spirit of defending the country as displayed in the 1950s and display the fireworks of final victory, fireworks of national reunification in the sky above Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 KPA Officer Sin Sung Il made a speech on behalf of the men and officers of the KPA to be followed by a speech by Kim Hak Min, workshop manager of the Chollima Steel Complex, on behalf of workers. Then taking the floor were Yun Chun Hwa, chairwoman of the management board of the Chongsan Co-op Farm of Kangso District, on behalf of the agricultural workers and Rim Il Kwang, student of Kim Il Sung University, on behalf of youth and students.
					
					 They pledged to cherish the soul of the heroic soldiers who fought risking their lives for the homeland and carry forward the history and tradition of the victory in the war which the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il brought about and thus win a victory in the confrontation with the U.S.

articles.title: Evening Gala of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Evening Gala of Youth and Students Held 
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- An evening gala of youth and students "For My Only Motherland" was held at the Kim Il Sung Stadium this evening to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Watching the evening gala were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae  and other senior party, state and army officials, war veteran delegates, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, men of meritorious services, delegations of overseas Koreans and other compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign delegations and delegates, diplomatic envoys of different countries and military attaches of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests.
					
					 The evening gala began with prologue "July 27 of Victory".
					
					 The participants danced to the tune of songs "For My Only Motherland", "July 27 March", "Song of National Defence" and "We Have Won".
					
					 In scene 1 "Highest Tribute to the Great Generalissimos" youth and students paid highest tribute to the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who glorified the dignity and might of Korea by carrying forward the history and tradition of certain victory provided by the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In scene 2 "I Will Devote My Youth to the Country" the participants represented the great pride and self-confidence of the younger generation who enjoy a worthy life under the care of the great sun.
					
					 The evening gala reached its climax in scene 3 "Our Eternal July 27" and epilogue "Forward for Final Victory under Leadership of the great Marshal Kim Jong Un" which  reflected the fixed will of the young vanguard to eternally glorify the history and tradition of certain victory, holding the peerlessly illustrious commander in high esteem.
					
					 War veteran delegates, overseas Koreans and foreign guests joined youth and students in cheerful dancing.
					
					 The evening gala powerfully demonstrated the fixed will of the Songun young vanguard to glorify the undying feats Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war and the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and lead July 27 of war victory to a final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. and the drive for building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Unhasu Concert Marks War Victory Anniversary
articles.content:
Unhasu Concert Marks War Victory Anniversary 
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A Unhasu concert "Victory" was given in Pyongyang Sunday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victor in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Among the audience were senior party, state and army officials, delegates of war veterans, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, men of merits and citizens.
					
					 Overseas Koreans delegations and compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front also enjoyed the concert.
					
					 Present there on invitation were delegations and delegates from different countries, diplomatic envoys of different countries and military attaches of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests.
					
					 The concert began with chorus "Song of General Kim Il Sung", immortal revolutionary paean. Put on the stage were colorful numbers like mixed sextet and chorus "Our July 27", female trio and female pangchang "Song of Best Wishes", immortal masterpiece.
					
					 Orchestra and chorus "Song of National Defence", male sextet "Song of Truck Driver", male quartet "Song of Sniper", chorus "Advance", orchestra "To a Decisive Battle" and other wartime songs touched the strings in the hearts of the audience.
					
					 The orchestra reached its climax with narrative and orchestra "Victory" and female solo and chorus "Our Peace Is Guaranteed by Arms" which instilled the iron truth that the cause of the DPRK led by the great commanders is just and one has to be prepared for a war if one wants peace and that only victory and glory will be recorded in the flag of the DPRK.
					
					 The concert demonstrated the revolutionary spirit of the army and people of the DPRK determined to achieve the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. in the same indomitable fighting spirit as displayed in the flame of war and usher in the heyday of great prosperity in Kim Jong Un's era in which the idea and desires of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu are being brought into bloom.

articles.title: Music, Dance Performance Given by Army Artistes
articles.content:
Music, Dance Performance Given by Army Artistes
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Music and dance performance "Final Victory Is Guaranteed by Our Arms" was given by the State Merited Chorus and the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble at the April 25 House of Culture on Sunday to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Among the audience were senior party, state and army officials, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, Pyongyangites and university students.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as mixed chorus "The Leader and the General Are Always Together ", male chorus "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung", bayan duet and orchestra "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu" and female solo and dance "Tell, O Road of Songun".
					
					  The performers sang high praises of the immortal feats the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war and the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They impressively represented the unwavering will of all the service personnel and people to glorify July 27, the day of war victory, as July 27 of final victory by carrying forward the fighting spirit of the heroic soldiers in the 1950s, true to the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance reached its climax when male choruses "Footstep Heard on Mt. Osong" and "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms" were presented to resound through the theatre.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience for its high ideological and artistic value as it reflected the boundless mental power of the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army and for rich voice, truthful representation and dynamic rhythm.

articles.title: Acrobatic Suite Held
articles.content:
Acrobatic Suite Held
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- An acrobatic suite "For My Only Motherland" is going on at the Pyongyang Circus Theater to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Put on the stage were physical acrobatics "Elastic Trapeze", "Elastic Flight", "Rope Etude" and "Pole Playing", ice acrobatic "Rope-skipping on Ice", animal acrobatic "Dove on Ice" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers impressively represented with peculiar skills and elegant rhythms the indomitable fighting spirit of the soldiers and people who defended the country at the cost of their blood under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung during the wartime.
					
					 People from all walks of life, youth and students and foreign guests appreciated the performance on Sunday.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestlers Proved Successful at Asian Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestlers Proved Successful at Asian Championship
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestlers bagged four gold medals at the 2013 Asian Junior Wrestling Championship now under way in Mongolia.
					 The championship which started on July 25 brought together 350 wrestlers from 14 countries and regiond including the DPRK, Mongolia and Thailand.
					
					 DPRK Ri Se Ung and Kim Kum Hyok came first at the men's 42 kg greco-roman event and men's 42 kg freestyle event and DPRK Yon Jo Hwa and Kim Son Hyang in women's 43 kg and 46 kg freestyle events.
					
					 Kim Han Song won a silver medal in men's 50 kg freestyle event and Ri Jin Ok and Kim Yu Song bronze medals in the women's 49 kg and 52 kg freestyle events.

articles.title: Chongryon Marks Anniversary of War Victory
articles.content:
Chongryon Marks Anniversary of War Victory
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on July 26 for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and other Chongryon officials.
					
					 The participants in the lecture watched a video showing the solemn ceremony of completing the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery that was held in the presence of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also shown were Korean films showing Marshal Kim Jong Un receiving Chinese and Syrian delegations on visits to the DPRK to take part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war.
					
					 Then there was a lecture titled "Songun Korea demonstrating victories in the confrontation with the U.S."
					
					 The lecturer said that the final victory in the all-out confrontation with the U.S. is certain as there is Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the feats the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war and the Songun leadership feat of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A photo exhibition took place at Joson University of Chongryon on the same occasion.
					
					  The university published a collection of education information "July 27 of victory eternally shining in the history of the homeland" on the war victory anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was brought out in booklet by the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries on July 23.
					 The work published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998) deals with the 5-point policy for the great national unity which serves as the important guidelines in achieving the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Japanese Right-wing Element's Sophism Slammed
articles.content:
Japanese Right-wing Element's Sophism Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Japanese consul-general in Los Angeles in a contribution to a U.S. newspaper on July 21 said that Japan finished apology and reparation for its past war crimes and that it is wrong to assert that Japan failed to repent of cruel atrocities it committed during the Second World War and to make reparation for victims.
					 He was so impudent as to say that Japan has provided compensation to the victims who were sexually abused by the Imperial Japanese Army and rendered efforts for medical aid and welfare for them.
					
					 In this regard Koreans in the U.S. denounced Japan for killing innocent people and forcing hundreds of thousands of Korean women into sexual slavery during the Second World War. This was atrocities unprecedented in history, they added.
					
					 Questioning how the word "apology" can supersede Japan's criminal history, they said the consul-general should shame to tamper with history.
					
					 They urged Japan to mirror the crime-woven past in its textbooks to teach the present and future generations correct history.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats in War Victory Praised by Foreign Party, Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats in War Victory Praised by Foreign Party, Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Political party and organizations of various countries posted special write-ups on their websites from July 18 to 21 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Romanian Socialist Union posted the following article titled "A rare strategist".
					
					 The DPRK less than 2 years old won a victory in the war against the imperialist allied forces led by the U.S. which had the strongest military muscle, economic power and long history of aggression in the world. The victory was the precious fruition of the outstanding strategy, tactics and unique war methods of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The exploits of Kim Il Sung, a great strategist, in the war victory and the spirit of defending the country and heroic self-sacrificing spirit displayed by the Korean people united close around him will shine forever along with the July 27 victory.
					
					 The Romanian Workers' Association posted an article praising the undying feats of the iron-willed commander.
					
					 The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK posted an article titled "60 years ago, an event that startled the world" illustrated with a photo documenting the revolutionary activities of the President.
					
					 The article noted that the Korean People's Army, which was viewed to be no match for the U.S. in numerical number and technique, achieved the brilliant successes including liberation of Seoul in only 3 days after the war started.
					
					 It stressed that the U.S. was compelled to sign the Armistice Agreement which is as good as an official surrender document in the world eyes on July 27, 1953, saying that the U.S. loss in the three-year war was unbelievable.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and other articles.
					
					 The articles praised the greatness and immortal exploits of the talented strategist and iron-willed brilliant commander who shattered the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 They also praised the grit, pluck and far-seeing wisdom of the peerlessly great man who shaped a bright blueprint for the postwar rehabilitation and construction, looking far into the victorious future in the flames of the severe war.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Urged by International Body
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Urged by International Body
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization released a statement on July 22 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Extending warm congratulations to the Korean people marking the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war, the statement said:
					
					 The Korean people worked such a miracle as shattering the myth of U.S. "mightiness" by bringing about a great victory in the war ignited by the U.S. under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander.
					
					 World progressive mankind is still remembering with deep emotion the undying exploits the President performed by beating back the aggression by U.S. imperialism and leading the showdown with the U.S. to victory.
					
					 The U.S. has hindered the reunification of Korea and escalated tension in a bid to realize its strategy to dominate the world for six decades since the end of the war.
					
					 We strongly urge it to dismantle the illegal and anachronistic "UN Command" at once, replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty and unconditionally pull its forces out of south Korea.
					
					 And we extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to independently and peacefully reunify the country by their concerted efforts by removing the confrontation between the north and the south and implementing the joint declarations, free from interference by outsiders.

articles.title: Indian National Seminar Marks Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War
articles.content:
Indian National Seminar Marks Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A national seminar took place in New Delhi on July 20 under the sponsorship of the Indian preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 On display in its venue were photos showing the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to victory and Songun revolutionary leadership feats of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un. Also displayed there were books introducing the greatness of the illustrious commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Speeches were made by some personages including Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council and director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Harish Gupta, director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, and Sadhna Harish, chairwoman of the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics.
					
					 The speakers said it was thanks to the outstanding strategy and tactics and original war methods of President Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander, that the DPRK could beat back the U.S. which claimed to have suffered no defeat in wars.
					
					 Thanks to the superb commanding art of the President, the Korean people shattered the myth of "mightiness" of the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for it, they said, adding the undying military exploits of the President will shine long in the world history of struggle against imperialism.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK as it is led by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, who has successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun pioneered by Kim Il Sung and inherited and developed by leader Kim Jong Il. The Korean people will always emerge victorious and demonstrate honor in building a thriving socialist nation and carrying out the cause of national reunification, they said.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: DPRK Supported by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Supported by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Broken armistice: war or peace" on its website on July 12 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The website in an article subtitled "Armistice is not a peace" noted the state of armistice has prevailed on the Korean Peninsula for six decades. It added:
					
					 The DPRK has long made sincere efforts to replace the Armistice Agreement (AA) by a peace treaty.
					
					 However, the U.S. has totally negated and denied it.
					
					 Its ulterior design is to look for a chance to ignite a new war and occupy the whole of Korea while maintaining the state of ceasefire.
					
					 Referring to such incidents as the U.S. spy ship Pueblo, large-size spy plane EC-121 and Panmunjom incident, it said the U.S. shifted the blame for all those cases onto the DPRK and attempted to ignite a war against it.
					
					 Another article subtitled "Armistice has already been destroyed" referred to the fact that the U.S. has systematically violated the AA and, in particular, introduced even troops from its satellite countries into the recent joint military drills with south Korea.
					
					 Entirely just was the solemn declaration of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army that AA will be totally nullified under such serious situation, it noted.
					
					 Noting the DPRK's choice is clear as the U.S. has made a provocation, an article subtitled "War or peace" said it is an invariable stand and steadfast way of counteraction of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to counter the enemies' war of aggression with a war of justice, dagger with a sword and rifle with a gun.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Observed by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Observed by Foreign Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A political party of Russia and an organization of Poland released statements on July 22 and 23 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Noting July 27 this year is the 60th anniversary of the Armistice Agreement which is little short of a document of surrender to the U.S. which attempted to stifle the independent DPRK, the National Salvation Front of Russia in its statement said:
					
					 Under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung the service personnel and people of the DPRK inflicted an ignominious defeat upon the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK which achieved a great victory in the war has made the U.S. tremble with fear, foiling its every move of aggression.
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to the entire Korean people who are greeting the significant anniversary of victory in the war.
					
					 We are convinced that it is not long time off for the Korean people to live in a reunified country.
					
					 The Poland branch of the Korean Friendship Association noted the U.S. imperialists mobilized huge forces of aggression and employed all sorts of barbarous means and methods in the Korean war to bring the Korean people into submission.
					
					 The exploits Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander and legendary hero, performed by leading the war to victory will be eternal, it stressed, adding:
					
					 The Korean people's victory brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for U.S. imperialism and ushered in a new era of global anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 Popular heroism displayed by them will always be remembered by the progressive mankind.
					
					 The U.S. should immediately withdraw its forces from south Korea, dismantle the "UN Command" and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: Inaugurado Museo Conmemorativo de Victoria en  Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria
articles.content:
Inaugurado Museo Conmemorativo de Victoria en  Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria
Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 27 la solemne ceremonia de inauguracion del Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					En el museo estan distribuidos los halles, pabellones, escenas panoramicas de gran tamano, objetos exhibidos, etc.
					
					Todos sus espacios estan acondicionados como centro de educacion en la tradicion de victoria para transmitir las proezas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il por la victoria en guerra y en la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					Esa zona, que tiene en su centro el Monumento a la Victoria en Guerra, se ha convertido en un gran museo al aire libre compuesto de la exposicion de armas benemeritas y otras a la intemperie. 
					
					Cuando llego el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el jefe de la guardia de honor del EPC le dio el parte de recepcion. 
					
					Se tiraron 21 salvas. 
					
					El Mariscal paso revista a la Guardia de Honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino y subio a la tribuna. 
					
					Aparecieron en la tribuna Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
					
					Se veian ahi Li Yuanchao, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y vicepresidente de la Republica Popular China, y Yu Zhenwu, ex comandante de las fuerzas aereas del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China.
					
					Participaron en el acto de inauguracion los delegados de veteranos de guerra, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, benemeritos y trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					Fueron invitados el grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon, los compatriotas en ultramar y sus delegaciones incluido el grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, las delegaciones y delegados de varios paises, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					La palabra inaugural estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC. 
					
					Choe dijo que el Museo es el eterno tesoro que glorifica las inmortales hazanas de victoria en la guerra y de la revolucion del Songun de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y el centro de la victoria que da a conocer el espiritu de la lucha heroica y proezas del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC que vencieron por primera vez a los imperialistas norteamericanos.
					
					Subrayo que es el centro para la educacion en la tradicion de la victoria en que inculca al ejercito y el pueblo la firme voluntad de continuar siempre la historia de invencible victoria y la base principal de la educacion clasista antiyanqui. 
					
					Seguidamente, hubo el desfile de la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino. 
					
					El Mariscal corto la cinta de inauguracion del Museo tendida ante la escultura "Victoria". 
					
					Recorrio el museo junto con los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, la delegacion de la RPCh y otras delegaciones y delegados de varios paises, los representantes diplomaticos y miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea e integrantes de las delegaciones de compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					Tras recorrer el Museo, el Mariscal expreso gran satisfaccion de que se haya acondicionado excelentemente como patrimonio nacional y como lugar de enfrentamiento antiyanqui e importante base de educacion antiyanqui.

articles.title: Tiene lugar velada de fuegos artificiales
articles.content:
Tiene lugar velada de fuegos artificiales 
Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ACNC) -- Se realizo por la noche de este sabado en esta capital la solemne velada de fuegos artificiales "Venceremos siempre" dedicada al 60o aniversario de la gran victoria del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 Los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de diferentes sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares se reunieron en varios lugares de esta capital en torno al rio Pothong, donde esta levantado el Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, para ver los fuegos artificiales de festejo.
					
					Salio al palco el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Disfrutaron el panorama de fuegos artificiales los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los delegados de veteranos de guerra, funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, familiares de martires, oficiales y soldados del EPC y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, benemeritos y s trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron invitados las delegaciones y delegados extranjeros, representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, y huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Entre los espectadores se distinguian tambien el grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon, compatriotas en ultramar y sus delegaciones, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Pronuncio el discurso de la ocasion Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					Los fuegos artificiales a lanzarse hoy en el cielo de la Corea del Songun son una expresion de la infinita veneracion de todos los militares y habitantes hacia los grandes hombres del monte Paektu quienes defendieron el destino de la patria, la nacion y el socialismo al vencer a los agresores norteamericanos y conducir a la victoria sucesiva el enfrentamiento con EE.UU., apunto el orador.
					
					Declarado el inicio de la velada, comenzo a repercutir la cancion "27 de julio, dia de la victoria" mientras se inyectaron fuegos artificiales en el cielo sobre el Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Al son de la "Cancion de la defensa de la Patria", los fuegos artificiales lanzados desde ambos lados de la escultura "Victoria", tema principal del Monumento a la Victoria, iluminaron el lugar dando mas luz al inmortal manuscrito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "Homenaje a la gran decada".
					
					La velada prosiguio con la interpretacion de "Nuestro General es el mejor" y "La fuerza de Corea" y otras canciones.
					
					Llego al climax cuando repercutieron las melodias de las canciones "Adelante hacia la victoria final" y "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General Kim Jong Un".
					
					Las salvas de celebracion tiradas al cielo de julio significaron la gloria que rinde el pueblo coreano al Mariscal, quien esta continuando las hazanas de los Generalisimos.
					
					Los espectadores tuvieron el infinito honor y la felicidad de disfrutar la velada de fuegos artificiales junto con el Mariscal.
